charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was visiting the
beach when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Lana gazing out over
the ocean.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0401_0500:
Of course, I know there aren’t any wild Pokémon
here to catch.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_0800: There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, you see.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_0900:
So far, I’ve only managed to catch some strapping
young swimmers—mostly men, though I did reel in
the occasional lady!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1000:
*giggle* Are you surprised? It’s a secret whether
that’s true or not.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1100:
I’m disappointed that I can’t fish for Pokémon here,
but there isn’t anything I can do about that.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1200:
No need to worry, though—I’ve set my sights on
something big, so I’m still having a lot of fun!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0401_1400:
Yes! The title of Champion of Pasio! There’s no
bigger catch than that!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0402_1600:
The title of Champion of Pasio, of course! There’s
no bigger catch than that!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1700:
That’s why I’ve been fishing here—to lure some
sync pairs into battling me!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1800:
And by “lure” I mean Araquanid and I challenge
them to a battle!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_1900:
That means you’re catch of the
day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2000:
Araquanid has been eager to pounce on you since
the moment you arrived!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0402_2400: Aw, shucks. You didn’t fall for it, huh?
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2500: I was just kidding. I bet you didn’t expect that!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2600:
I think Araquanid sees you as a
rival, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2700:
Araquanid have a habit of storing things they
value in their water bubbles.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2800:
If you’re not careful, she might even try to snatch
the Champion spot here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_2900: I feel the same way, too, though.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3000:
I have my pride as a captain, and I want to be
someone my little sisters can look up to.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3100:
That’s why I can’t afford to lose to you or anyone
else, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3200:
You want proof? Look! All the swimmers we’ve
defeated are floating in Araquanid’s bubble!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0401_3400:
*chuckle* It’s always worth seeing if you’ll take
the bait, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_0402_3600: Oh? I guess you didn’t take the bait...
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3700:
I’m glad I got to see you today. You’re always
wonderful to talk to.
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3800:
You never know when something big will bite—
that’s what makes fishing so fun!
charaepi_ch0160_00_suiren/2301_1201_3900:
I look forward to battling you again! Then we’ll
see just how big a catch you really are!
